suppose.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to think that something is probably true, based on what you know
suppose.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: There were many more deaths than was first supposed.
There’s no reason to suppose (=it is unlikely that) he’s lying.
What makes you suppose we’re going to sell the house?
suppose.translation[0].definitions[0].no: In more formal English, you can say it is supposed that something is true
It is usually supposed that girls are less aggressive than boys
suppose.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to expect that something will happen or be true, and to base your plans on it
suppose.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The company’s plan supposes a steady increase in orders.
